name: CSS Images
headerImageAlt: A light blue background with the face of a cartoon tiger centered in the middle. The tiger has round ears, small eyes, and a big smile. His name is Hobbes, from the comic strip Calvin and Hobbes.
description: A set of drawings created with HTML and CSS. Some ideas came from provided prompts and some from my imagination. I got a lot of time to play with positioning items and creating shapes on these!
